sections.heading: Definitions
sections.text: 198.01 Definitions.—When used in this chapter the term, phrase or word:

sections.heading: of law by Department of Revenue.
sections.text: of law by Department of Revenue.

sections.heading: of books, papers, records, or memoranda by the department.
sections.text: of books, papers, records, or memoranda by the department.

sections.heading: of agents by department; bonds of agents; may administer oaths; credentials.
sections.text: of agents by department; bonds of agents; may administer oaths; credentials.

sections.heading: Rules
sections.text: 198.08 Rules.—The department has authority to adopt rules pursuant to ss. 120.536(1) and 120.54 to enforce the provisions of this chapter and may adopt, as rules, such rules and regulations as are promulgated with respect to the estate tax or generation-skipping transfer tax provisions of the Revenue Act of the United States insofar as they are applicable hereto. The department may from time to time prescribe such forms as it shall deem proper for the administration of this chapter.

sections.heading: return to be made in certain cases; certificate of nonliability.
sections.text: return to be made in certain cases; certificate of nonliability.

sections.heading: to make return; extension of time for filing.
sections.text: to make return; extension of time for filing.

sections.heading: of determination of deficiency in federal tax to be filed with department.
sections.text: of determination of deficiency in federal tax to be filed with department.

sections.heading: to pay tax; penalties; delinquent or deficient taxes, interest.
sections.text: to pay tax; penalties; delinquent or deficient taxes, interest.

sections.heading: to pay tax when due, department’s warrant, etc.
sections.text: to pay tax when due, department’s warrant, etc.

sections.heading: due payable from entire estate; third persons.
sections.text: due payable from entire estate; third persons.

sections.heading: of real estate by personal representative to pay tax.
sections.text: of real estate by personal representative to pay tax.

sections.heading: discharge of personal representative until tax is paid.
sections.text: discharge of personal representative until tax is paid.

sections.heading: judge to report names of decedents, etc.
sections.text: judge to report names of decedents, etc.

sections.heading: and powers of corporate personal representatives of nonresident decedents.
sections.text: and powers of corporate personal representatives of nonresident decedents.

sections.heading: of estate, notice of lien, limitation on lien, etc.
sections.text: of estate, notice of lien, limitation on lien, etc.

sections.heading: to pay tax, evasion of tax, etc.; penalty.
sections.text: to pay tax, evasion of tax, etc.; penalty.

sections.heading: exemptions from inheritance and estate taxes.
sections.text: exemptions from inheritance and estate taxes.

sections.heading: When used in this chapter the term, phrase or word:(1)“Department” means the Department of Revenue
sections.text: (2)“Personal representative” means the executor, administrator, or curator of the decedent, or, if there is no executor, administrator, or curator appointed, qualified, and acting, then any person who
